      Constructors in ccre.channel with parameters of type BooleanOutput 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates all of the specified BooleanOutputs with the current state of this BooleanStatus.

      Create a new BooleanStatus with the value of false that automatically updates the specified BooleanOutput with the current state of this BooleanStatus.
